description: Try our easy to follow Troy and Marty's Sweet Potato & Corn Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Pescatarian,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Sweet potato,Sesame free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Troy and Marty's Sweet Potato & Corn Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 corn on the cob, corns removed and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the fritter ingredients in a bowl.
Use a teaspoon of mixture to make each fritter. Put as many as you can in the pan, leaving some space between each so they donâ€™t stick.
Top the fritters with tzatziki then salmon then chives.
